TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationTrustManager implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable

summary.span: 确定是否应执行应用程序以及应授予它哪个权限集。

span.span: Determines whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions should be granted to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信任管理器必须实现接口。Trust managers must implement the interface. 宿主调用方法来确定是否应执行应用程序和应用程序应授予哪些权限。The host calls the method to determine whether an application should be executed and which permissions should be granted to the application. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更高版本，没有只有一个信任关系管理器，它可以是自定义实现的接口。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later, there is only one trust manager, which can be a custom implementation of the interface. 默认信任关系管理器实现提示用户输入的权限安装应用程序和提升到应用程序授予的权限。The default trust manager implementation prompts the user for permission to install the application and to elevate the permissions granted to the application. 其他信任关系管理器实现可能提供不同的用户体验。Other trust manager implementations might provide different user experiences. 例如，实现可能会检查受信任的应用程序，而不是提示用户输入此信息为企业列表。For example, an implementation might check an enterprise list for trusted applications instead of prompting the user for that information. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的简单实现。The following example shows a simple implementation of . [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager/CS/customTrustManager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager/VB/customtrustmanager.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust DetermineApplicationTrust(class System.ActivationContext activationContext, class System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext context) cil managed

param.name: activationContext
param.span: 应用程序的激活上下文。

span.span: The activation context for the application.

param.name: context
param.span: 信任应用程序上下文的管理器。

span.span: The trust manager context for the application.

summary.span: 确定是否应执行应用程序以及应授予它哪个权限集。

span.span: Determines whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions should be granted to it.

returns.span: 一个对象，包含有关应用程序的安全决策。

span.span: An object that contains security decisions about the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机来确定是否应执行应用程序和哪一组权限它应被授予调用方法。The method is called by the host to determine whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions it should be granted. 返回对象属性，它包含权限集，代表为每个应用程序的上下文中执行的程序集授予的权限。 returns an object with a property that contains a permission set representing the permissions to be granted to each assembly executing within the context of the application. 全局程序集缓存中的程序集不适用于授予的权限。The granted permissions do not apply to assemblies in the global assembly cache. 对象还具有信任关系管理器设置以指示是否应该信任应用程序的属性。The object also has an property that the trust manager sets to indicate whether the application should be trusted. 如果信任关系管理器指示应用程序可以是受信任，主机激活该应用程序，并授予其程序集的中提供的权限集集合。If the trust manager indicates that the application can be trusted, the host activates the application and grants its assemblies the set of permissions provided in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现自定义信任关系管理器的方法。The following example shows an implementation of the method for a custom trust manager. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager/CS/customTrustManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager/VB/customtrustmanager.vb#2)]
